altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins

description.en:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.
description.ko:
전생엔 초등교사, 현생엔 가정교사.
인생 2회 차인 세라 포포는 전생의 경험을 살려
귀족 자제들을 대상으로 고액 가정교사 일을 하는 중이었다.
목표는 건물주!

그러던 어느 날,
제국의 황제가 찾아왔다.

“포포 양께서 제 동생들의 가정교사를 맡아주면 좋겠어요.”

물 폭탄, 밀가루 폭탄, 벌레 공격 등
온갖 악질 장난은 다 한다고 악명이 자자한 쌍둥이 전하들의
가정교사가 되어 달라는 무시무시한 제안을 하기 위해!

달콤하기 짝이 없는 고액을 곁들인,
그 악마의 제안이 세라의 인생을 뒤흔들었다.

#환생물 #육아물
#전생도 현생도 교사 여주
#육아지옥에 빠진 황제 남주

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

altTitles.ja: メダリスト

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

description.en: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit... But one day, they're targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)
description.ja: 空からやってきたエイリアンに支配された星。生きる希望を失った男・ジョンは残された生存者達と一縷の望みをかけ謎の信号の発信源へ向かうが――…

title.en: Maou-sama no Mou Approach ga Overkill Sugimasu

altTitles.ja: 魔王様の猛アプローチが オーバーキルすぎます

description.en:
24-hour surveillance of ex-lover's activities.

A handsome demon king and an unlucky hero from a previous life.

Despite his bad luck, Yuuki Yuta lives an ordinary life. One day, a handsome transfer student, Mazaki Rei, arrives at Yuta's school. Although it should be their first meeting, Rei's sense of distance from the very first day is a bit strange.

When Yuta asks him why, he learns that Rei is the Demon King and that Yuta was a former hero in his previous life, And they were even lovers...!

Until Yuta's curse is lifted, he and the Demon King begin a 24-hour, indefinite life of surveillance!

altTitles.ja: 犬の黒人男性

description.en:
Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street. 
Because of his father, Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society.
So one day he’s gonna find that man, and RAPE him.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA Plus Creators](https://medibang.com/mpc/titles/wt2208302035572710014241408/) | [ART street](https://medibang.com/book/xb2005061537310810014241408/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/61917191/series/172665)
- Discord - [Server](https://discord.gg/BzQXA4vwXt)
description.fr: Rex est moitié humain et moitié chien. Il est né quand un vieux mec bourré a baisé une chienne errante dans le rue. À cause de son père, Rex doit vivre en étant rejeté par la société. Alors un jour… il va retrouver ce type, et le VIOLER
description.hr:
Rex je polu čovjek, polu pas. Nastao je kada je pijani starac silovao kuju lutalicu na ulici.
Zbog svog oca, Rex mora živjeti svoj život kao nakaza koju društvo odbacuje.
Zato će jednog dana pronaći tog starca i SILOVATI ga.
description.ru: Рекс - наполовину человек, наполовину собака. Он был создан, когда пьяный старик изнасиловал собаку на улице. Из-за отца Рекс вынужден жить как урод, отвергнутый обществом. Так что однажды... он найдет этого человека и отомстит ему.
description.uk: Рекс - напівлюдина напівсобака. Він був створений коли дуже п'яне чмо трахнуло вуличну собаку. Через нього він став потворою та ізгоєм. Тож одного дня... він знайде свого "татуся", і зґвалтує ЙОГО!
description.es-la: Rex es un híbrido mitad hombre, mitad perro. Fue creado cuando un viejo borracho abusó sexualmente de una perra callejera en la calle. Por culpa de su padre, Rex tiene que vivir su vida como un fenómeno, rechazado por la sociedad. Así que un día… encontrará a ese tipo y lo v*olará.

altTitles.ja: 今日も来たんすか、依田先輩。

altTitles.en: Have You Come Again Today, Yoda-senpai?

altTitles.vi: Hôm nay chị lại tới nữa à, Yoda-senpai?

description.en: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
description.ja:
**ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！**

俺の実家で、我が家のようにくつろぐこの女。 同じ高校の先輩で、姉の友達の依田燈。 学校まで片道2時間らしく、ほぼ毎日俺の家に居座っている。 無防備で少し抜けてる依田先輩に振り回されて、ドキドキしっぱなし!! ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！

title.en: I Am the Youngest Daughter of Murim's Strongest, the Namgung Clan

altTitles.en: Youngest Daughter of the Ultimate Martial Master Namgung Family

description.en:
"B-baa, baaah?! (Did I become a baby?! What about my revenge?!)
Everyone in the Namgung family despised me. My life was one where even my siblings turned their backs on me.
But at the moment when the family was annihilated, the choice my siblings made… was not the family, but me.

‘I never once thought of you as anything but family.’
‘Live. Even if it’s disgraceful and filthy, live, Ahee.’

Why did they save me?
A question I held in my heart my entire life as I carried out my revenge.
I thought I could finally close my eyes at the end of it all.

‘Baaah?’

I’ve returned to the past!
Could this be some black magic from the Blood Cult?
My… my revenge? My peaceful rest?!
And why are the Namgung siblings clinging to me again?!

What on earth is going on?!"

altTitles.ja: ベルサイユのばら

altTitles.th: กุหลาบแวร์ซายส์

altTitles.de: Lady Oscar: Die Rose von Versaille

description.en:
In 1755, in three European countries, three people are born who will eventually have a fateful meeting in Versailles, France. 

Hans Axel von Fersen, born the eldest son of a Swedish senator; Oscar François de Jarge, born the youngest daughter of a French general; and Marie Antoinette, born the princess of Austria and the Habsburgs! 

The great masterpiece that shines in the history of Shojo Manga is finally here!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.fr: Le chevalier qui ne vit qu'aujourd'hui

description.en: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
description.pt-br: "Você é um gênio." Essas palavras que ele ouviu quando era criança eram veneno. Encrid sonhava em ser um cavaleiro, mas logo percebeu que era fútil. "Quer viver pela espada com esse nível de habilidade?" Uns davam risada dele. "Apenas desista." Outros aconselhavam contra. Mesmo assim, o sonho dele não morreu. Ele dormia menos, corria mais, e se esforçava pra caramba. Um dia, morreu, com uma espada perfurando sua garganta. Encrid abriu os olhos novamente para a "manhã de hoje".

title.en: The Evil God Descends, I Own Great Hell

altTitles.zh: 邪神降世，我有一座大凶狱

description.en:
In the apocalypse, an evil god descends, devouring humans and threatening my homeland, China! Little do they know, I hold the control of the Demon-Suppressing Hell, where countless gods and ancient monsters from China have been secretly imprisoned for thousands of years! All for this moment... to annihilate the foreign gods and cleanse the human world!

— Of course, if you surrender, as the Warden, I might consider letting you evil gods into the Great Hell to work on sewing machines. Meals and accommodation are provided, of course.

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi o Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: 最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。＠COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi wo Hajimemashita

altTitles.en: The Weakest Tamer Began a Journey to Pick up Trash

altTitles.fr: La dresseuse sans étoiles parcourt le monde pour récolter des déchets

altTitles.ru: Слабейшая укротительница в путешествии по сбору мусора

altTitles.th: การผจญภัยของเทมเมอร์มือใหม่ กับสไลม์สุดด๋อย

altTitles.ko: 최약 테이머는 폐지 줍는 여행을 시작했습니다

altTitles.zh: 最弱的驯养师开启的捡垃圾的旅途

altTitles.id: Penjinak terlemah mulai berkelana untuk memungut sampah

altTitles.uk: Найслабша приборкувачка почала свою подорож зі збирання сміття

altTitles.id: Pawang Terlemah Mulai Berpetualang Menjadi Pemulung

description.en:
When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill – Taming – and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start – at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name.  And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame.

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)
description.fr:
Dans un monde fantasy où l'avenir de chacun est déterminé par les "skills" révélés durant l'enfance, la jeune Ivy se voit attribuer le métier de dresseuse de monstres au rang le plus bas qui soit : sans-étoile. Rejetée par son village, elle entame alors un voyage aux côtés de Sora, un slime tout faible, seul monstre qu'elle ait réussi à apprivoiser.
La plus faible des dresseuses et le plus faible des monstres parviendront-ils à survivre dans ce monde rude et sans pitié... ?
description.ja: スキル上主義の異世界。気弱で優しい魔物使い《テイマー》に転生した少女・アイビーは星なしの最弱ランクがために命を狙われ、生きるために旅に出る。道中唯一テイムできたのは最弱の崩れスライム「ソラ」最弱同士の２人（匹）には魔物がはびこる異世界は過酷……と思いきや＿＿？

description.en: Even angels give into temptation. Once God’s right-hand warrior, the archangel Agnes has succumbed to desire and formed a contract with Lucifer, the ruler of demons. Now a fallen angel, she poses as a simple taxi driver and patrols the bustling city of Seoul during the midnight hours. Cursed by the king of hell to seek souls for her life force, Agnes pursues depraved individuals who prey upon innocents for their own pleasure, and uses their carnal desires against them. But when her past comes back to haunt her, a tantalizing game of cat and mouse involving vengeful entities ensues.

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: さらなみ

altTitles.ru: Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2491232) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/).
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

altTitles.ja: Solo for Two～あなたに捧ぐヴァリエーション～

description.en:
There are three rumors about the star ballet dancer, Sasya.

First, he's a sodomist.
Second, he gets high on drugs before performing on the stage.
Third, he sells himself to his wealthy patrons.

And some of these rumors are true.

Despite all this, Sasya was once loved unconditionally, but he abandoned his love in pursuit of success.

One day, Sasya's long past love reappears before him, looking completely different and filled with hatred towards Sasya.
description.pl: To miłość od pierwszego wejrzenia dla Karela, kiedy podczas podróży widzi zaniedbanego, ale pięknego Sasyę. Chociaż Karel oferuje mu jedzenie i zakwaterowanie, Sasya wymyka się, nie pozostawiając żadnych wskazówek co do swojej tożsamości. Los jednak zbliża ich do siebie, gdy Karel znajduje zdjęcie Sasyi w domu rosyjskiego księcia i odnajduje go w Paryżu. Kiedy dowiaduje się, że Sasya jest utalentowanym baletnikiem, który uciekł z Rosji w trudnych okolicznościach, Karel przygarnia go z pomocą swojego bogatego przyjaciela, Juliana. Jednak Sasya wie, że oferta sponsoringu Juliana jest ważna tylko tak długo, jak długo Karel będzie nim zainteresowany...

description.de:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
description.en: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
description.fr:
Depuis son plus jeune âge, Artezia vit dans l’ombre de son frère, dont le succès suffirait à garantir le bonheur et la sécurité de la famille, selon sa mère. Elle devient donc la meilleure alliée de ce dernier, organisant maintes conspirations afin de l’aider à accéder au trône impérial. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. Un sort magique lui permet de revenir plusieurs années en arrière et de changer le cours des choses… Mais Artezia parviendra-t-elle à changer le destin, alors que l’amour s'immisce au milieu du chaos?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/villainess-lives-again-fr)
description.ja:
謀略の天才、皇帝を作り上げる！ ”お兄様が成功すれば、お前も成功するのよ” それを信じ、あらゆる悪事を企てた悪女「アルティゼア」。 しかし、彼女の兄への忠誠は裏切りとして返ってくる。 死を前にした彼女に手を差し伸べたのは宿敵であり、正義ある大公「セドリック」だけだった。 魔術で命と引き換えに18歳の自分に生まれ変わった彼女は、「セドリック」を皇帝にするために新たな人生を捧げることにするがーー

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/50796)
description.ko:
모략의 천재, 황제를 만들다!

"오빠가 잘되어야 너도 잘되는 거야."

온갖 악행을 저질러 오빠를 황제로 만들었다.
하지만 아르티제아의 헌신은 배신으로 돌아왔다.
죽음의 문턱에서 그녀에게 구원의 손을 내민 것은, 정의로운 숙적 세드릭 대공뿐이었다.

“계책을 내라.”
“…….”
“이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 인물을 나는 그대 외에는 떠올리지 못하겠어. 로산 후작.”
“…….”
“나에게는 그대의 힘이 필요하다.”

이미 기울어진 세력 판도를 뒤집고 도탄에 빠진 제국을 구할 계책은 없다.
그러나 방법은 있다.
모든 것이 잘못되기 이전으로 시간을 돌리는 것.

피의 눈물과 함께 그녀는 자신의 몸을 바쳐 고대마법으로 시간을 돌린다.
이번에는, 실패하지 않으리라.

죽지 않고 18세로 회귀한 아르티제아는 세드릭 대공을 위한 악녀가 될 것을 결심한다.

“저에게 청혼해 주십시오. 당신을 황제로 만들어 드리겠습니다.”

악마에게 무릎을 꿇은 대가로,
당신은 당신 대신 손을 더럽힐 악마를 얻을 것입니다.
description.pt: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric.Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira... de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.
description.ru:
«Твой старший брат хорош, и ты должна соответствовать.»
Она совершила множество злoдеяний, чтoбы сделать своего старшего брата Императором. Однако преданность Артезии обернулась против неё, ведь единственным, кто подал ей руку помощи на пороге смерти, был заклятый враг, эрцгерцог Седрик.
«Уловки прочь.»
«Я не знаю никого, кроме вас, кто мог бы обратить эту ситуацию вспять. Маркиза Розанна.»
«Мне нужна ваша сила.»
Казалось, тогда уже невозможно было спасти Империю, находившуюся в крайне бедственном положении, и предотвратить падение власти. Но всё же был один способ. Повернуть время вспять прежде, чем все пойдёт не так. Она, с кровавыми слезами на глазах, пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы овладеть древней магией и обернуть время вспять. В этот раз она не подведёт. Вернувшись в возраст восемнадцати лет, Артезия принимает решение не покорно умереть, а стать злодейкой и пойти на службу к эрцгерцогу Седрику.
«Пожалуйста, сделайте мне предложение. И я сделаю вас Императором.»
Дабы демoн пал ниц, нужнo запoлучить другoгo, что испачкает руки вместо вас.
description.zh:
前世为助哥哥成王做尽坏事，却反遭灭口…这一世甘为恶女，联手曾经的政治宿敌，夺回操控人生的王座！

description.en:
When I bought a mountain, I never expected it to be from another world!
And while I was leisurely enjoying a countryside life suited to this strange realm, I unknowingly began making the mountain more powerful!?

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)
description.ja: 山を買ったら、それがまさかの異世界だったなんて！ しかも異世界仕様の田舎暮らしをのんびり楽しんでいたら、知らぬ間に山をパワーアップさせていて!?

description.en:
Shin Jae-Won attended the World Camp hosted by the Spanish King as a tennis player in his Junior Year.  
  
Jae-Won meets Javier, an unusually conspicuous participant in the World Camp.  
  
“When are we going to practice?”  
  
There are always people (especially women) around him.  
  
Then, Jae-Won, who happened to stumble upon Javier one night during practice, ended up spending the night alone. The more he faced his whimsical, pure side, the more his heart began to beat…  
  
“I hate this kind of things…”  
  
Jae-Won’s first love ended as fast as a Siesta.  
  
A decade later, they meet again Spain.

title.en: Boku wa Kimitachi wo Shihai suru

altTitles.zh-hk: 我將要支配你們的一切

description.en:
Seven women, one man, a suspenseful harem story!

During a class reunion, the school became an enclosed dimension without warning. Yelling and screaming brought no response. 26-year old unemployed Haruka Sato has to survive by cooperating with seven of his former classmates. Soon, the extreme conditions began to eat away at their sanity, and Haruka's hidden desires began to take hold.
description.ru:
Семь женщин и один мужчина - захватывающая история о гареме!

Во время встречи выпускников школа неожиданно превратилась в замкнутое пространство. Крики и вопли ни к чему не привели. 26-летнему безработному Харуке Сато приходится выживать, сотрудничая с семью своими бывшими одноклассниками. Вскоре экстремальные условия начали разъедать их рассудок, и скрытые желания Харуки начали овладевать ими.

---

(Source: [mangalib](https://mangalib.me/boku-wa-kimitachi-wo-shihai-suru?section=info))
description.vi:
Bảy nữ, một nam, câu chuyện hậu cung hồi hộp!
Trong một buổi họp lớp, trường học bỗng nhiên bị một bức tường kỳ lạ bao quanh, không ai có thể thoát ra được. Haruka Sato 26 tuổi thất nghiệp phải sống sót bằng cách hợp tác với bảy người bạn học cũ của mình. Cuối cùng, hoàn cảnh khắc nghiệt bắt đầu ăn mòn tâm trí của họ, và dục vọng thầm kín của Haruka đã lộ ra nanh vuốt
description.es-la: ¡Siete mujeres, un hombre, una historia de harén llena de suspenso! Durante una reunión de ex-alumnos, la escuela se convirtió en una dimensión cerrada sin previo aviso. Los gritos y chillidos no trajeron respuesta. Haruka Sato, desempleado de 26 años, tiene que sobrevivir cooperando con siete de sus antiguas compañeras de clase. Pronto, las condiciones extremas comenzaron a devorar su cordura, y los deseos ocultos de Haruka comenzaron a afianzarse.

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

altTitles.ja: 宝石商のメイド

description.en: The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where "a maid sells jewels". Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.
description.ja: 宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。きらめく宝石を手にしたとき、彼らの人生もまた輝きだす。

description.de:
Alle Schurken sind besiegt und die Helden haben die Welt gerettet. Das klingt erst einmal gut, doch sind wirklich alle Helden gut? Nicht alle, die sich „Helden“ nennen, verhalten sich auch so: Eine Frau, deren Schwester von einem dieser „Helden“ getötet wurde, begibt sich auf die Mission, den Täter zu finden, und wird zum „Hero-Killer“, der jede Nacht Jagd auf korrupte Helden macht. Kann sie es schaffen, ihre Schwester zu rächen und die Welt zu einem besseren Ort zu machen?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3403)
description.en:
The world is in constant turmoil, with constant wars breaking out between Heroes and Villains.

Gifted with supernatural abilities, one lone girl sets out on a bloody path for revenge against the injustices of the world she lives in. With the constant clashes between titans, no one is safe.

If no one is willing to protect the innocent, who are the real heroes, and who are the real villains? What truly separates one from the other?
description.es:
El mundo está en constante agitación, con guerras constantes desatándose entre héroes y villanos. Dotada con habilidades extraordinarias, una chica solitaria recorre un camino sangriento de venganza contra las injusticias del mundo en el que vive. Con los enfrentamientos constantes entre los titanes, nadie está a salvo. Si nadie está dispuesto a proteger a los inocentes, ¿quiénes son los verdaderos héroes? ¿Quiénes son los verdaderos villanos? ¿Qué es lo que realmente separa a los unos de los otros?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3422)
description.fr:
Dotée de capacités surnaturelles, Ehwa, une jeune fille solitaire, s'engage sur un chemin sanglant afin de se venger pour sa soeur qui a été tuée par un "héros". Elle ne sait toujours pas qui de ces "héros" est responsable de sa mort, mais cela lui importe peu... car il suffit de les massacrer tous.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3151)
description.hu: A világ állandó kavarodásban van, állandó háborúk törnek ki a Hősök és a Gonoszok között. Természetfölötti képességekkel felruházva egy magányos lány véres útra indul, hogy bosszút álljon a világ igazságtalanságai ellen, amelyben él. Ha senki sem hajlandó megvédeni az ártatlanokat, kik az igazi hősök és kik az igazi gonosztevők? Mi választja el igazán a másikat?
description.id:
Bertahun-tahun yang lalu, Ehwa kehilangan saudara perempuan karena seorang hero yang tidak dikenal. Sampai sekarang, tidak ada yang tahu siapa pembunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. Tetapi hal itu tidak masalah baginya, karena dia akan menghabisi semua hero yang ada di dunia.

---
Perang berakhir dengan kekalahan para villain. Sekarang dunia dikuasai oleh Hero yang korup. Dan Salah satu Hero tersebut membunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. dia tidak tahu yang mana, tapi tidak masalah. Jika dia membunuh satu per satu, mereka akan ada di antara mereka. Ehwa menjadi Hero killer, Villain yang memburu para Hero setiap malam. "Aku akan membunuh semua orang dan akan mengambil semuanya!"

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/hero-killer/list?title_no=3083)
description.it: Il mondo è in costante fermento, con continue guerre scoppiate tra eroi e cattivi. Dotata di abilità soprannaturali, una ragazza solitaria intraprende un percorso sanguinoso per vendicarsi contro le ingiustizie del mondo in cui vive. Con i continui scontri tra titani, nessuno è al sicuro. Se nessuno è disposto a proteggere gli innocenti, chi sono i veri eroi e chi sono i veri cattivi? Cosa separa veramente l'uno dall'altro?
description.ko:
전쟁은 빌런들의 패배로 막을 내렸다.
이제 세상은 부패한 히어로들이 지배하고 있다.
그리고, 그런 히어로들 중 하나가 이화의 언니를 죽였다.
언니를 죽인 게 누구인지는 모르지만 상관없다.
한 놈씩 죽이다 보면 그중에 있을 테니까.
이화는 매일 밤 영웅들을 사냥하는 빌런, 히어로 킬러가 된다.
​
한 악당의 지독한 액션 활극.
“모조리 죽이고, 빼앗아 주마!”
description.th:
เรื่องราวสงครามระหว่างเหล่าฮีโร่และวายร้ายได้จบลงด้วยชัยชนะของกลุ่มฮีโร่ แต่โลกในตอนนี้กลับปกครองด้วยกลุ่มฮีโร่ที่ฉ้อฉล และหนึ่งในฮีโร่กลุ่มนั้นได้ฆาตกรรมพี่สาวของอีฮวา อีฮวาไม่รู้เลยว่าฮีโร่คนไหนที่ลงมือฆ่าพี่สาวของเธอ เธอเลยตัดสินใจไล่ฆ่าพวกฮีโร่ไปทีละคน เธอคิดว่าถ้าฆ่าพวกฮีโร่กลุ่มนั้นให้หมด แล้วมันจะนำไปสู้การล้างแค้นให้พี่สาวเธอได้ การล้างแค้นของวายร้ายผู้สิ้นหวังได้เริ่มต้นขึ้น “ฉันจะฆ่าพวกแกทุกคน ฉันจะพรากทุกอย่างที่แกมีไปจากแก”

description.zh-hk:
戰爭在反派的敗北下落幕了，而世界由腐敗的英雄們接手掌控。 然而，其中一個英雄殺了苡禾的姐姐。 她不在乎兇手是誰，反正把他們全部殺掉就可以了。 苡禾每晚都會行動，成為了英雄殺手的反派角色。 一個壞蛋的殘忍獵殺行動。「全部殺掉！全部搶走！」

altTitles.ja: その悪役貴族、ママヒロインが好きすぎる ～真摯な努力で最強となり不遇な推しキャラ助けまくる～

altTitles.en: The Villainous Noble Loves Mom Heroines Too Much ~Becoming The Strongest With Sincere Effort To Save Misfortunate Fave Chars~
That Villainous Aristocrat Is Actually Crazy About Mom Heroines ~With His Earnest Hard Work, He Becomes the Strongest and Saves All of His Favorite Characters~
The Villainous Aristocrat Loves His Mother Heroine Too Much: Becoming the Strongest Through Sincere Efforts and Saving His Favorite Character

description.en:
The mom characters who appear in the game *MamaFan* are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why... Why do such cute moms have to die?!”. Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then on a certain day, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of *MamaFan*... However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who's got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who's crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)
description.ja:
ゲームに登場するママキャラたちは、全員がバッドエンドルートしかない、あまりにも不遇すぎるサブヒロインでした――。

「なんで……なんでこんなかわいいママが死ななきゃならないんだよぉおお！」

彼女たちの救済ルートを求めるも、叶わず落胆の日々を送っていた主人公。だが、ある日突然このゲーム世界に転生することに。

・・・ただし、闇落ちルートしかない悪役貴族として。

This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.

女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

description.en:
After a freak accident involving some lightning winds up zapping him dead, 15-year-old Mochizuki Touya wakes up to find himself face-to-face with God. 

"I am afraid to say that I have made a bit of a blunder.", laments the old coot. But all is not lost! God says that he can reincarnate Touya into a world of fantasy, and as a bonus, he gets to bring his smartphone along with! 

So begins Touya's adventure in a new, anachronistic pseudo-medieval world. Friends! Laughs! Tears! Inexplicable Deus ex Machina! He sets off on a journey full of wonder as he absentmindedly travels from place to place, following whatever goal catches his fancy. 

The curtains lift on an epic tale of swords, sorcery, and smartphone apps!
description.ja: 神様のうっかりによって死んでしまった主人公は、スマートフォンとともに中世ヨーロッパ風異世界に転生してしまい……？ゆるゆる異世界珍道中、さて、のんびり参りましょう。
description.vi:
Mochizuki Touya, 15 tuổi là main giống như bao anh main khác khi đang trên đường về nhà lại bị… sét đánh lăn đùng ra chết :v.Điều đáng nói ở đây là sau khi chết anh main lại bị triệu tập đến trước mặt Thượng đế với lý do: Ổng vô tình… hại chết anh main mà không hay biết. Và để đền bù thì ảnh đã được hồi sinh sang một thế giới song song khác với 1 cái Sì mát phôn (Smartphone :v).
Thừa hưởng trong mình một di sản to lớn về những nền văn minh cổ đại, anh thong dong đi trên con đường đơn độc tại một thế giới khác trong khi sở hữu một nguồn sức mạnh thậm chí có thể giúp anh làm bá chủ của cả thế giới thời bấy giờ.
Càng đi anh càng tạo thêm cho mình nhiều đồng chí quan trọng và trước khi kịp nhận ra… anh đã ngày càng lún sâu vào những bí mật được cất giấu tại thế giới đó…
description.pt-br: Touya Mochizuki foi acidentalmente morto e, como uma desculpa, Deus lhe permite renascer em um mundo de fantasia e lhe concederá qualquer coisa que ele desejar. E assim, Touya escolhe manter seu smartphone no próximo mundo. Em sua segunda chance na vida, ele faz amizade com muitas figuras importantes e se depara com o segredo do mundo. Ele herda o legado de uma civilização antiga e viaja despreocupadamente enquanto possui poderes que rivalizam com os reis daquele mundo.

altTitles.ja: ゴーアンゴー

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

altTitles.ja: エイリアン９

In the future, alien invasion is a daily occurrence and everyone must be prepared. Elementary School #9 has assigned three students to fight off the extra-terrestrial threat.  
  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=784) for the anime.

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

description.ru:
Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

---

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

---

掉入异世被迫假扮情侣，可公爵你的演技太差了吧！
在一次拍摄过程中，备受全球瞩目的巨星赛琳娜因突发事故穿越到了北部公爵的领地上。北部公爵卡西温将她从魔兽手中救了下来，并向她提出合约，要求她假装成自己的爱人，进入社交界获取情报……

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

Osananajimi to wa Romcom ni Naranai

altTitles.en: It won't Become a Romcom with Childhood Friends

altTitles.zh-hk: 和青梅竹馬之間不會有戀愛喜劇

altTitles.ar: لا مزيد من الحب مع الفتيات.

altTitles.th: ไม่มีทางที่มันจะกลายเป็นเลิฟคอมเมดี้กับยัยเพื่อนสมัยเด็กหรอก

altTitles.vi: Làm Gì Có Chuyện Tình Hài Hước Giữa Bạn Thuở Nhỏ Được!

description.en: The high school boy Eiyuu has a problem! His two childhood friends (♀) who go to the same school as him, Shio and Akari, are too cute! Even though they have no interest in him, he looks at their grown-up selves with sexual interest. If they were to find out... it would be utterly embarrassing! Meanwhile, his two childhood friends also have secrets of their own...!? It's irritating! It's complicated!! But childhood friends are the best!!!
description.ja: 高校生男子・えーゆーの悩み。それは、二人の幼馴染「しお」と「あかり」が可愛すぎること! 向こうにその気はないのに、俺だけがオトナになった二人をエッチな目で見てるなんてバレたら…ハズすぎる! 一方、実は二人もえーゆーのことが…!? ヒロイン全員、幼馴染!! じれったい! ややこしい!! けど幼馴染って超最高っ!!!
description.th: เอยู (A.U.) หนุ่มมอปลายที่กำลังพบปัญหาใหญ่! ปัญหานั่นก็คือเพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคน "ชิโอ" และ "อาการิ" ที่อยู่โรงเรียนเดียวกันนั้นน่ารักเกินต้าน! ถ้าหากทั้งสองรู้ว่าเขาได้มองพวกเธอที่เติบโตขึ้นมาอย่างสมส่วนด้วยสายตาลามก (ถึงแม้จะไม่ได้ตั้งใจ) ล่ะก็มีหวังแย่แน่! ในทางกลับกัน เพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคนนั้นเองก็มีความลับของตนเอง...!? ทั้งหยอกเย้า! ทั้งทำให้สับสน!! ถึงจะอย่างนั้นเพื่อนสมัยเด็กนี่แหละยอดที่สุด!!! เลิฟคอมเมดี้รักสามเส้าแสนหวานที่พูดตรง ๆ ไม่ได้♡

description.en: Jung Jaehan, a third-generation chaebol, is an influential person in the entertainment industry and he’s bored to death. Tired of drugs, alcohol, and pleasure, he meets the new movie director Yoon Heegyeom—the same Yoon Heesung, who was a rising rookie actor that retired even at the peak of his acting career because of a drug scandal

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: わざと見せてる? 加茂井さん。

altTitles.en: Kamoi-san, Are You Showing It on Purpose?
Are You Showing It on Purpose?

description.en: Sudo, is an unassuming second-year junior high boy, who likes to draw. Kamoi-san, his classmate, is a middle school girl (JC) in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.
description.fr:
On suit l'histoire de Sutô, un jeune étudiant en seconde année du lycée plutôt banal voire transparent, mais qui a un passion pour les mangas et sait dessiner. Kamoi, la gyarû de sa classe, elle-même fan de manga, remarque les qualités de dessinateur de Sutô. 
S'installe entre eux une relation d'amitié, voir...
description.ja: 中学２年生の加茂井さんは、クラスに一人はいたようでいなかった、でもやっぱりいたＪＣギャル！　そんなクラスでも目立つ加茂井さんと、存在感のない地味な僕の物語。

title.en: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!

altTitles.ja: 生徒会にも穴はある!

altTitles.en: There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!
Even the Student Council has Holes

altTitles.vi: Hội học sinh cũng lắm trò vui!

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

ロックは淑女の嗜みでして

altTitles.ja-ro: Rock wa Lady no Tashinami de shite
Rock wa Shukujo no Tashinami de shite

description.en:
Ririsa Suzunomiya, who is forced to live a cramped life at a girl's school where genuine ladies gather, 
is drawn to the sounds coming from the old school building...? The gorgeous and ladylike girls shout with beautiful sparks!

From the author of "Joujuu Senjin! Mushibugyou", a youthful story of rich ladies and rock!

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

altTitles.ja: 雪女は冷たくされたい

altTitles.en: Snow Woman Wants to Be Treated Coldly

description.en: The story features a playful take on the yuki-onna mythological character, with a unique blend of romantic comedy and supernatural elements. It explores themes of emotions and relationships, particularly through the lens of a yuki-onna who experiences unexpected warmth and connection despite her icy nature.

altTitles.ja: 怪獣8号

description.en:
A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---
Kafka hopes to one day keep his pact with his childhood friend Mina to join the Japan Defense Force and fight by her side. But while she’s out neutralizing kaiju as Third Division captain, Kafka is stuck cleaning up the aftermath of her battles. When a sudden rule change makes Kafka eligible for the Defense Force, he decides to try out for the squad once more. There’s just one problem. He’s made the Defense Force’s neutralization list under the code name Kaiju No. 8.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
description.es:
Japón tiene la mayor tasa de incidencias por ataques de Kaijus de todo el mundo. Los Kaijus irrumpen continuamente y sin piedad en las vidas cotidianas de la gente. Kafka Hibino, que siempre quiso ser un miembro de las Fuerzas de Defensa, actualmente trabaja como limpiador de cadáveres de Kaijus.
Sin embargo, un día, una misteriosa criatura convierte a Kafka en un Kaiju, y las Fuerzas de Defensa de Japón, encargados de derrotar a estos monstruos, le identificaron con el nombre clave de “Kaiju N.8”.
description.fr:
Enfant, Kafka Hibino rêvait d’intégrer les Forces de Défense pour combattre ces terribles ennemis, mais après de nombreux échecs à l’examen d’entrée, ce trentenaire travaille à nettoyer les rues de leurs encombrants cadavres. Jusqu’au jour où une mystérieuse créature s’introduit dans son organisme et le métamorphose en une entité surpuissante mi-humaine, mi-kaiju. Son nouveau nom de code : “Kaiju n° 8” !

Maison d'édition FR : Kazé / Crunchyroll
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ja: 怪獣発生率が世界屈指の日本。この国は、容赦なく怪獣が日常を侵していた。かつて防衛隊員を目指していたが、今は怪獣専門清掃業で働く日比野カフカ。ある日カフカは、謎の生物によって、身体が怪獣化、怪獣討伐を担う日本防衛隊からコードネーム「怪獣8号」と呼ばれる存在になる。
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

altTitles.ja: マダラランブル

description.en: In modern Japan, where "vampires" that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as the "Madara-sou," a unit notorious for being full of "troublemakers." Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly "dangerous," even among the eccentric residents of Madara-sou.
description.ja: 人に擬態し、人を喰う「吸血鬼」が跋扈する現代日本。ヤツらを狩るため、銀武器片手に人知れず戦う少女たちがいた！駆除業者の中でも問題児が集まった部隊・即応六班――通称「まだら荘」。吸血鬼を引き寄せる「ごちそう」体質を持ち、人を遠ざけ生きてきた昴 玲央がそこで出会ったのは、まだら荘の中でも一際美しく一際ヤバイ女・紀里谷 開花でーー。

altTitles.ja: 英雄教室

description.en: Blade is a carefree transfer student whose only goal is to make friends with his classmates at Rosewood Academy, a school for heroes-in-training. On the surface, Blade seems like an ordinary boy, but he is hiding a miserable secret with seeds that start long ago, with the defeat of the Demon King at the hands of the Great Hero.
description.ja: 魔王と相打ちになり、勇者の力を失った元勇者の少年・ブレイド。念願叶って普通の生活がついに手に入る…と思いきや、転入させられたのは<<英雄>>を育てるエリート学園だった！周囲はもちろん優秀。だけど元勇者のブレイドは、「優秀」の枠を遥かに超える規格外の<<超生物>>で…!?　普通ってなんだっけ!?

altTitles.ja: バビル２世　ザ・リターナー

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!

altTitles.ja: 暁のヨナ

altTitles.en: Yona: The Girl Standing in the Blush of Dawn

altTitles.ru: Иона: Девушка, стоящая в лучах рассвета

altTitles.th: กู้บัลลังก์มังกรแดง

altTitles.id: Yona, The Girl Standing in the Blush

description.de: Als einzige Tochter von König Il ist Yona die Prinzessin eines kleinen Reiches namens Koka. Zur Feier ihres 16. Geburtstags kehrt ihr Cousin Su-won, in den sie schon lange verliebt ist, in den Palast zurück. Doch er verfolgt einen finsteren In der Nacht ermordet Su-won Yonas Vater mit seinem Schwert. Yona muss die schreckliche Tat mit ansehen, kann jedoch mit ihrem Leibwächter und Jugendfreund Hak vor den einfallenden Soldaten fliehen. Aber auch außerhalb des Palastes lauern viele Gefahren…
description.en:
Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka, living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics, the most divine sweets, a loving emperor as a father, and the hottest cousin crush, Soo-won, any girl could ever hope to have. Now, if only her bodyguard, Son Hak, weren't so annoying towards her, and if her hair weren't so red...

But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves, Soo-won, murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona, and they lead a life on the run from that point on.
___
Yona reels from the shock of witnessing a loved one's murder and having to fight for her life. With Hak's help, she flees the palace and struggles to survive while evading her enemy's forces. But where will this displaced princess go when all the paths before her are uncertain?
description.es: El futuro del reino de Kôka se encuentra en manos de la princesa Yona, una joven que ha pasado su vida bajo los atentos cuidados de su padre, el rey, y su escolta Hak. Con motivo de su 16º cumpleaños, su primo Soo-won, de quien está enamorada, viene a visitarla, pero... ¡le aguarda un cruel destino que jamás habría imaginado!
description.fr: Yona, princesse du royaume de Kôka, a grandi dans l’insouciance, choyée par le roi et protégée par son garde du corps et ami d’enfance, le puissant guerrier, Hak. À l’approche de ses 16 ans, Yona est heureuse: son cousin et amour secret, Soo-won, vient lui rendre visite pour célébrer son anniversaire. Mais ce soir-là, une terrible tragédie survient et sa vie va être bouleversée à jamais!
description.id:
“Aku tidak minta banyak-banyak... Asal bisa melihat senyum Suwon, aku sudah sangat bahagia.”

Yona, putri satu-satunya kerajaan Kouka telah lama memendam cinta pada Suwon, sepupunya. Saat ulang tahunnya yang ke-16, Yona bertekad memilih Suwon dan menolak perjodohan yang dipilihkan sang ayah.

Tapi yang terjadi di depan matanya membuat Yona harus kehilangan semuanya... ayahnya, kerajaannya dan cintanya pada Suwon...
description.it: Yona, principessa del Regno di Kouka e unica figlia del re, è cresciuta circondata dalle attenzioni del padre e della sua guardia del corpo Hak. Il giorno dei festeggiamenti per il suo sedicesimo compleanno arriva a corte suo cugino Suwon, di cui è innamorata. La ragazza è al settimo cielo, totalmente ignara del crudele scherzo che il destino ha in serbo per lei... un’attesissima saga fantasy intrisa di romanticismo, tra epiche lotte e antichi regni!
description.ja: 高華王国の姫・ヨナは一人娘のため、優しい父王と幼なじみで護衛のハク達に囲まれ、大切に育てられていた。そして時はヨナ・16歳の誕生日、ヨナは想いを寄せていた従兄のスウォンから簪を贈られ、父へ自分の気持ちを伝えに行く。が、そこには思いも寄らぬ過酷な運命が!?
description.ko:
고화국의 공주인 연화는 일 왕의 보호 아래 세상 일은 전혀 모른 채 항상 성 안에서 지내고 있었으며 그녀의 소꿉친구로는 학과 수원이 있었다. 그러나 부왕 일이 소꿉친구이자 짝사랑 상대였던 사촌 수원의 손에 살해 당하고, 이 광경을 목격한 연화는 16살의 생일에 일생 가장 큰 위기를 겪게 된다.

학의 도움으로 궁을 빠져나온 사이 수원이 고화국의 왕위를 계승하고, 연화는 마음을 추스르며 앞으로의 길을 모색하던 중, 문덕이 얘기한 신관 익수의 신탁을 듣고, 고화국의 건국신화 속 비룡왕을 보필하던 네 용의 후손을 찾는다.
description.pl: Księżniczka Yona, córka władcy państwa Koka, nigdy nie miała poważnych zmartwień. Dość powiedzieć, że za swoje największe nieszczęście uważała fakt, że jej kuzyn, Su-won, w którym skrycie się podkochiwała, nie traktował jej poważnie. Gdy więc młodzieniec przybył do pałacu, aby wziąć udział w uroczystości na cześć szesnastych urodzin księżniczki, ta nie posiadała się z radości. Jednak to właśnie tej nocy cały jej świat miał lec w gruzach. Su-won zamordował jej ojca, a następnie próbował zabić również Yonę. Od niechybnej śmierci uratował ją młody generał, a zarazem przyjaciel księżniczki, Son Hak. Jednak ucieczka z pałacu to dopiero początek. Czy Yona zdoła odnaleźć w sobie dość siły, aby zmierzyć się z okrutną rzeczywistością i odzyskać władzę?
description.ru:
Йона — единственная принцесса королевства Коука. Она ведет роскошную и беззаботную жизнь, как и подобает принцессам. У неё есть всё: лучшая одежда и косметика, превосходные сладости, любящий отец Император Иль, и сильнейшие чувства к кузену Су Вону, о котором многие могли лишь мечтать. Вот только если бы её телохранитель Сон Хак не так раздражал и её волосы не были такими красными.

Все меняется в ночь на шестнадцатый день рождения девушки. Почти идеальный мир быстро рассыпается, когда человек, которого она любит — Су Вон — убил её отца. Путь к его становлению на престол ныне гарантирован. Вместе с Хаком, Йона скрылась из замка в поисках помощи, и с этого момента они ведут жизнь в бегах…
description.th: เรื่องราวของ โยนะ องค์หญิงแห่งอาณาจักรโคกะที่มีเรือนผมหยักศกสีแดงสด เพราะเป็นพระธิดาพระองค์เดียว จึงได้รับการเลี้ยงดูมาอย่างทะนุถนอมโดยพระบิดาผู้อ่อนโยน กับ "ฮาคุ" ซึ่งเป็นทั้งเพื่อนสมัยเด็กและองครักษ์คอยคุ้มกัน และแล้วในวันเกิดอายุ 16 ปีของโยนะ "ซูวอน" ลูกพี่ลูกน้องที่โยนะมีใจให้ ได้มอบปิ่นปักผมเป็นของขวัญ จากนั้นโยนะก็ไปบอกความรู้สึกของตนให้กับบิดาที่คัดค้านการแต่งงานระหว่างเธอกับซูวอนรับรู้ แต่ที่นั่นมีชะตากรรมอันโหดร้ายที่คาดไม่ถึงรอคอยเธออยู่
description.tr: Kouka Krallığı’nın prensesi Yona, tek çocuk olduğu için hem çocukluk arkadaşı hem de koruması Hak ve yumuşak kalpli babası kral tarafından el üstünde tutularak büyütülmüştür. 16. doğum gününde Yona, küçüklüğünden beri hoşlandığı kuzeni Soo-Won’dan bir saç tokası alır. Kendi duygularından emin olan Yona konuşmak için babasının yanına gider. Ancak orada onu beklenmedik zalim bir kader beklemektedir! Bir ülkenin yıkıma nasıl gittiğini anlatan bu tarihi dram ve romantik fantazi başlasın.
description.vi: Yona là công chúa duy nhất của 1 vương quốc, sống cuộc sống xa hoa và vô ưu của 1 công chúa. Cô ấy có tất cả: những bộ quần áo lộng lẫy nhất, mỹ phẩm tuyệt nhất, đồ ngọt ngon nhất, có người cha là hoàng đế hết mực yêu thương, có người anh họ vô cùng điển trai, Soo-won, để ý đến. Nhưng, cô lại có một mái tóc màu đỏ và có một tên vệ sĩ vô cùng phiền nhiễu, Son Hak. Cuộc sống tưởng chừng hoàn hảo đó lại nhanh chóng tiêu tan khi người mà cô yêu, Soo-won, đã giết cha của cô để đảm bảo con đường lên nắm quyền của mình. Son Hak cùng Yona bỏ trốn và sống cuộc sống ẩn mình từ đó. (Lưu ý: Thực sự thì tên trong truyện có vẻ như mang hơi hướng Hàn Quốc, việc dịch phụ thuộc hoàn toàn vào Eng nên có gì các bạn thông cảm nhé, truyện này là manga chứ không phải manhwa đâu :D Hơn nữa chúng tớ cũng ko kiếm được wiki truyện này, có thì cũng chỉ toàn tên như trên thôi TT^TT)
description.pt-br: Yona, única princesa do reino, era apaixonada pelo seu primo e tinha uma vida luxuosamente despreocupada, como toda princesa. Mas tudo muda depois de uma traição que a obriga a fugir do castelo com seu guarda-costas, Son Hak. Nisso, eles descobrem sobre uma lenda que mudará totalmente o destino deles.
description.zh-hk: 從小備受父王及哈克寶貝呵護的高華國公主‧優娜，在她16歲生日的當天，她的心上人蘇芳來到宮殿，並送她漂亮的髮簪。不過優娜的父親並不允許她跟蘇芳的交往，依舊對蘇芳無法死心的優娜決定向父王表明她的心意時，卻意外地撞見父親被刺殺的驚人場面。不肯面對事實的優娜從此便與護衛哈克展開一連串的逃亡生活……
